Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay tablet inscribed in Babylonian cuneiform; letter from the ruler Biridiya of Megiddo to the Egyptian pharaoh Amenhotep III or Amenhotep IV (Akhenaten); 47 lines; the bottom two corners are broken; 5+3
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (245)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (72)
Barnett 1977a / Illustrations of Old Testament History (page 16 no. 7)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.176)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Condition: Fair; the two bottom corners are damaged.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
